item.title: Satish Talim @ Google+ RE: Git Course
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Would YOU be interested in a free Git/GitHub course on G+ ? Git is an open source version control system designed to handle very large projects with speed and efficiency, but just as well suited for small personal repositories (collection of resources that is accessed to retrieve information); it is especially popular in the open source community. With GitHub you can host your public and private projects there and use it to collaborate on projects. Please +1 this post so that I can decide whether to conduct it here. Comments appreciated.
via plus.google.com
